class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cd89c">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Come" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cd89c">Brook, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cd89c">Brook </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#807cff">grow!" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cd89c">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cd89c">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now!" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span
